member.name: M:Solids.BooleanAPI.SurfaceSolidAPIIntersectionAreas(System.Collections.Generic.List{Revit.Elements.Wall},System.Collections.Generic.List{Revit.Elements.Wall})
member.summary: Extremely fast RevitAPI intersection between solids and surfaces
member.returns: List of numbers, representing the area to be deducted from each surface after the intersection
